website_summaries.verdict: At just under $100, this simple-to-control drone caters to newcomers, but more experienced pilots will appreciate its HD camera, precise handling, and dual speed modes.
pros: 720p HD camera beams footage directly to your smartphone via its companion app
Headless Mode and Altitude Mode are handy for learning how to fly
Low battery alarm reminds you to fly it back before it’s too late
cons: Does not include a SD card, which is essential if you want to save your in-flight footage

customer_reviews.title: Dont fly on windy days
customer_reviews.text: This drone is great for someone looking to learn how to fly one. The altitude hold feature works great. Being able to change out the batteries is also great. Although a battery only gives you about 8 minutes of flying time you can have multiple batteries charged and they dont cost much at all. Changing the battery only takes about a minute. Very easy to do. The video quality is great. The only thing to really keep in mind is that this drone is very light. If winds are more than 10mph you will have a littlw difficulty keeping it steady. All in all this is a great product and alot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Understanding I only paid 80 bucks for this unit: This is my 3rd drone for "Beginners". Not really a strong suit for this drone. Not sure if its the connection to the unit, but the controls are either very loose and it flies wherever it wants, or it flies tight and barely moves when using the joysticks. Trimming features are pretty much useless - they do not change the flying patterns or controls as needed. The max flight time on the included batteries has been about 2-3 minutes. On the plus side, it has lots of different beeps and sounds for various warnings! I would recommend looking for a drone in a little higher price range.
customer_reviews.author: RUNTY 1

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner drone, but....
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for beginners, very crash proof. However, the camera stopped working after just one hour. DP Power refunded my money and let me keep the drone. I removed the camera, which really was a toy anyway, and used it as a trainer, for which it is very well suited. I must have crashed dozens of times with no damage other than scratches on the guards. Still, there are plenty of trainer drones without cameras for half the price.

customer_reviews.title: Worked good at first, then lost signal to controller and broke.
customer_reviews.text: Was working good at first, but it decided to ignore the controller suddenly at around 30ft and floated off towards the tree line ignoring the controller. It hit a tree and one of the motor rotors snapped off. Apparently this is a common issue, wouldn't recommend to anyone.

product_meta.title: DBPOWER Drone U818A Discovery FPV WiFi Drones with Camera for Beginners/Kids/Teens,Quadcopter UAV with Altitude Hold/Headless Mode /3D Flips& 2 Batteries, Big Size
feature_bullets: HIGH DEFINITION 720P WI-FI CAMERA Equipped with a 720p HD camera, you’ll get to capture stunning aerial photos and video footage from a birds-eye perspective. You can enjoy a real-time viewing of your flight directly from your own mobile device

REAL-TIME, FIRST-PERSON VIEW OF YOUR FLIGHT Let this drone be your eyes as you see exactly what your drone camera sees straight to your phone or tablet using the iOS and Android app ‘FLYINGSEE’. Go on a virtual flight and see your surroundings from a different perspective

HEADLESS MODE/ALTITUDE HOLD Thanks to headless mode, you’ll never get confused about which direction the drone is facing as the forward direction is always the direction the user is facing. Whilst the altitude hold function keeps your drone stable at the same height so you can capture breathtaking shake-free video both in the air and on the ground

TWO-SPEED MODES Whether you’re a beginner or a skilled pilot, there is a speed that will suit you. Plus, automatic one-button takeoff and landing means that with the simple press of a button your drone will rise to a height or land, thus helping first-time pilots to fly with confidence

BONUS BATTERY TO DOUBLE YOUR FLYING TIME There are two large capacity batteries which can each last up to 6~9 minutes on a full charge. (CHARGING TIPS: Please charge the battery directly via a computer USB port or with a 5V/0.5A adapter)
